item.title: Hugo & Blowfish
item.description:
As you’ve probably read on the landing page, I’m no longer using this website, together with the Hugo-Framework.

It’s not because I don’t like Hugo — on the contrary, Hugo is very easy to use. I just wanted to learn more, so I switched to Astro, which includes modern JS frameworks.
